result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn M Vollriede was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court with attorney Brian Burke.  Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in custody.  Katherine M Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

 Probation having been revoked, sentencing proceeded.  Statements by each counsel and defendant.  

The court sentenced defendant to serve 5 months  in the House of Correction with Huber privileges for work and medical treatment  and can be served on  electronic monitoring, credit for 62 days time served.

Information on Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Pursuant to current District Court Rules, this case is assigned and 
forwarded to Judge Siefert br. 47
for review. os

Received from the Department of Corrections - Probation, request to:
[    ]   Extend Probation
[    ]   Set Restitution
[    ]   Remove Court Obligations
[    ]   Review / Modify Probation
[    ]   Convert Unpaid Obligations to Civil Judgment
( x )   Sentence After Revocation

Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court with attorney Mark E. Kershek.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 

Court withheld sentence, but granted defendant credit for zero days time served in the event that sentence is imposed at a later date.  Court placed defendant on probation for one year with the following conditions:
*defendant use only one pharamacy
*aoda/any treatment deemed appropriate
*fine in the amount of $500.00 inclusive of all mandatory costs, fees and  DNA surcharge during term of probation or civil judgment  shall be entered against the defendant
*defendant to provide DNA sample forthwith. 

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court with attorney Mark E. Kershek.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-23-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court with attorney Mark E. Kershek.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 09-08-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for status on counsel  in Branch 47.  Status conference scheduled for 08-13-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court PRO SE.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defendant requests time to hire counsel. Court granted defendant request. Case adjourned for Status of Counsel to branch 47.  Status conference scheduled for July 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Signature bond that was previously signed to remain. No use or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription,  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 05-21-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Shawn M Vollriede
Current: N8430 North Street, Ixonia, WI 53036   (Effective: 05-13-2015)
Prior: N8430 North Street, Ixonia, WI 53036

Defendant Shawn M Vollriede in court.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.   Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 47.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 5/13/15 @ 1:30 pm
